p.k: Forget the existing one-act dramas!Short but impactive! KBS Drama Special presents high quality single episode dramas.Dramas are the broadcast content with the widest public appeal
p.d: Forget the existing one-act dramas!Short but impactive! KBS Drama Special presents high quality single episode dramas.Dramas are the broadcast content with the widest public appeal.KBS Drama Special will produce short dramas of far-reaching impact involving at times a serious social message, unique emotions or perspectives. It will stay abreast of modern viewership.
